import InvestmentRow from './InvesmentRow/InvesmentRow' import styles from './InvestmentData.module.css' const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }) const InvestmentData = (props) => { return (
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
) } export default InvestmentData
